full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 141 of 236 1045 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 Q. Now, at seven minutes and 20 seconds, what are we seeing on the floor? 2 A. These are various swatches of material. 3 Q. Those items we just discussed, are those the items that led 4 you to believe that there might be some renovations coming up 5 in this property? 6 A. True. 7 Q. Now, at seven minutes and 49 seconds -- 8 MS. COMEY: Excuse me, withdrawn. 9 Q. At eight minutes and five seconds, what room are we in? 10 A. This is the garden room. You're standing west, looking 11 east. 12 Q. Now, eight minutes and 17 seconds, what room are we in? 13 A. This is the lake room. 14 Q. Now, eight minutes and 25 seconds, what room are we 15 entering now? 16 A. This is the foyer of the front door. 17 Q. At nine minutes and 19 seconds, what room are we walking 18 into? 19 A. This is the bathroom. 20 THE COURT: I need you to pause again. 21 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please pause. 22 THE COURT: They want to adjust the monitor at your 23 lectern. 24 MS. COMEY: Of course. Thank you, your Honor. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018242
